sentence.Network_en: Contrastingly, both the rooms leading off it gave an immediate impression of being disgraced.
sentence.Network_cn: 形成鲜明对比的是, 一开始时这两间屋子给人的直接印象都非常不雅.

sentences.sentence: "contrastingly, both the rooms leading off it gave an immediate impression of being disgraced"

auth_sentence.content: Contrastingly, Santa Rita is probably the quietest song they've recorded.
auth_sentence.res_content: Contrastingly, Santa Rita is probably the quietest song they've recorded.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Contrastingly, Santa Rita is probably the quietest song they've recorded.

auth_sentence.content: Contrastingly, while YSL was painfully shy in public he gorged himself on casual sex, drugs and egomania.
auth_sentence.res_content: Contrastingly, while YSL was painfully shy in public he gorged himself on casual sex, drugs and egomania.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Contrastingly, while YSL was painfully shy in public he gorged himself on casual sex, drugs and egomania.

baesInfo.translate_result: contrasting（靠近或作比较时）显出明显的差异，形成对比( contrast的现在分词 )
